ru.rosroble.client.management

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.rosroble.server.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for working with files. Provides XML read and write operations. The file is specified with environment variable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileManager(java.util.ArrayList<Ticket> collection, java.lang.String envVarName)

      Reads all the tickets from the XML-file.

      Saves the collection into XML-file specified in envVar.
      void setCollection(java.util.ArrayList<Ticket> collection) 
      void transformIntoFile(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
      Transforms a document object to a real XML-file on the machine.
